title: Kubernetes Secrets Management
summary: Secure handling of secrets in Kubernetes environments

concepts: K8s Secrets: Base64 encoded (not encrypted by default)
Encryption at rest: etcd encryption configuration
External Secrets Operator: Sync from external vaults
Sealed Secrets: Encrypt secrets for GitOps
CSI Secret Store: Mount secrets as volumes
patterns: Use external secrets management (Vault, AWS SM)
Never commit secrets to git (use Sealed Secrets)
Mount secrets as files, not env vars

examples.etcd_encryption: EncryptionConfiguration with aescbc or kms provider

antipatterns: Secrets in environment variables (visible in logs)
